title: The Intelligent Blue Jay
description: The Blue Jay is a crested, blue, black, and white bird native to eastern North America. It is known for its intelligence, complex social systems, and loud calls.

questions.question: What is a unique behavior of Blue Jays regarding their nests?
options: They only nest on the ground
They steal nesting materials from other birds
They can lay eggs in another bird's nest
questions.correct_answer: They steal nesting materials from other birds

questions.question: The Blue Jay is a member of which bird family?
What is the primary food source of Blue Jays?
What is a special ability of the Blue Jay's call?
options: It can mimic the sound of a rattlesnake
It can mimic the human voice
It can change pitch to trick predators
questions.correct_answer: It can mimic the sound of a rattlesnake

questions.question: Which of these is a unique characteristic of a Blue Jay's feathers?
options: They change color with the seasons
They can be used as a source of dye
